description: Lists all engagements that have happened in an incident.

parameters.name: TimeRangeValue
parameters.description: The time range to lists engagements for an incident. StartTime (datetime) --- The start of the time range. EndTime (datetime) --- The end of the time range.

nested_params.name: StartTime
nested_params.description: The start of the time range.

nested_params.name: EndTime
nested_params.description: The end of the time range.

nested_items.name: NextToken
nested_items.description: The pagination token to continue to the next page of results.

nested_items.name: Engagements
nested_items.description: A list of each engagement that occurred during the specified time range of an incident.

nested_items.name: EngagementArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the engagement.

nested_items.name: ContactArn
nested_items.description: The ARN of the escalation plan or contact that Incident Manager is engaging.

nested_items.name: Sender
nested_items.description: The user that started the engagement.

nested_items.name: IncidentId
nested_items.description: The ARN of the incident that's engaging the contact.

nested_items.name: StartTime
nested_items.description: The time that the engagement began.

nested_items.name: StopTime
nested_items.description: The time that the engagement ended.
